item.title: Setup SonarQube Project
item.description: Setup This guide assumes you have a GoCd Pipeline already setup. If not, Setup a Pipeline. Log in to SonarQube with your lab credentials. Add Project Click the Add Project drop down menu in the upper right-hand corner under your username and select Manually. On the next menu, enter in the Project Key and Display Name. They can be the same or different, but the Project Key is how Sonar indexes your project.
